definition: the typically narrowed part of the body between the hips and chest or upper back
examples: put his arm around her waist

definition: the greatly constricted basal part of the abdomen of some insects (such as wasps and flies)

the part of something corresponding to or resembling the human waist: such as, the part of a ship's deck between the poop and forecastle, the middle part of a sailing ship between foremast and mainmast
the middle section of the fuselage of an airplane
a garment or the part of a garment covering the body from the neck to the waistline or just below:
